HomePage.welcomeDescription: Your go-to platform for everything related to freshwater fish and aquatic plants. Whether you're just starting or a seasoned aquarist, we have the resources to help you create a thriving aquatic environment.

highlights.item1: Comprehensive species profiles with detailed care guides.
highlights.item2: Expert advice on maintaining a healthy aquarium.
highlights.item3: Tips for setting up your own virtual aquarium.

AboutPage.title: About Israquarium
AboutPage.introduction: Israquarium is your go-to resource for all things related to freshwater fish and aquatic plants. Whether you're an aquarium enthusiast, a professional aquarist, or someone just starting their journey into the world of aquatic life, Israquarium provides a wealth of knowledge to help you maintain thriving ecosystems.
AboutPage.missionDescription: At Israquarium, we believe that understanding the delicate balance of an aquarium ecosystem is key to maintaining healthy and vibrant fish and plants. We provide detailed and carefully curated information about a wide variety of freshwater species. Our mission is to empower aquarium owners with the tools and knowledge they need to create sustainable aquatic environments in their homes or businesses.

offerList.item1: Comprehensive species profiles for freshwater fish and plants.
offerList.item2: Guides for setting up and maintaining a healthy aquarium environment.
offerList.item3: Best practices for feeding, cleaning, and monitoring water quality.
offerList.item4: Tips and recommendations for dealing with common aquarium challenges.

AboutPage.offerDescription: Our platform is designed with hobbyists and professionals alike, providing the depth of information that can support both beginners and experienced aquarists.
AboutPage.globalDescription1: We believe that everyone should have access to reliable, educational resources about aquarium care, regardless of where they live or what language they speak. That's why Israquarium is available in multiple languages, including Hebrew, English, and Russian. Our goal is to make high-quality aquarium care knowledge accessible to a global audience.
AboutPage.globalDescription2: Whether you're in Israel or anywhere else in the world, you can count on Israquarium to provide accurate, detailed, and easy-to-understand content to guide you through your aquarium journey.
AboutPage.whyChooseUsDescription1: Israquarium stands out as a trusted resource for aquarium enthusiasts and experts alike. Our focus on freshwater species, paired with our commitment to providing multilingual resources, ensures that you have access to the most reliable and up-to-date information, no matter where you are or what your level of experience may be.
AboutPage.whyChooseUsDescription2: Join our growing community of aquarium lovers and take the next step in your aquatic journey. Whether you're learning how to start an aquarium or troubleshooting an issue with your fish or plants, Israquarium has the resources to help.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.introduction: At Israquarium, your privacy is of utmost importance to us. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you visit and interact with our website. By using our website, you agree to the practices described in this policy.
PrivacyPolicy.personalInfoDescription: When you register for an account on Israquarium, we may collect the following personal information:
PrivacyPolicy.personalInfoItem4: Preferences for notifications (feeding and cleaning reminders)
PrivacyPolicy.personalInfoItem5: Details about your aquarium, including fish species, feeding schedules, and cleaning schedules
PrivacyPolicy.virtualAquariumDescription: Users can create and maintain a virtual aquarium on our platform, including details like fish species, feeding schedules, and cleaning times. This data is stored in your account for tracking purposes.
PrivacyPolicy.nonPersonalInfoDescription: We collect non-personal information such as browser type, language preference, referring site, and the date and time of each visitor request. This information helps us understand how visitors use our website and improve our services.
PrivacyPolicy.usageDescription: The information we collect is used for the following purposes:
PrivacyPolicy.usageItem1: Account creation and management, including your virtual aquarium and fish cards
PrivacyPolicy.usageItem2: Sending email notifications about feeding and cleaning schedules (if opted-in)
PrivacyPolicy.usageItem3: Responding to inquiries or providing support
PrivacyPolicy.dataSharingDescription1: We do not use your personal information for any purposes other than those necessary for providing the services offered by Israquarium. Your data will not be shared with or accessible to any third parties unless required by law.
PrivacyPolicy.dataSharingDescription2: All information is used solely for the purpose of helping you maintain your virtual aquarium and providing timely notifications. We do not sell, rent, or otherwise share your personal data with any outside parties for marketing or other purposes.
PrivacyPolicy.notificationsDescription: If you opt in, we will send you email notifications about feeding schedules and cleaning times for your virtual aquarium. You can modify your notification preferences or unsubscribe at any time through your account settings.
PrivacyPolicy.dataSecurityDescription: We implement security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure. While we strive to protect your personal information, no method of transmission or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
PrivacyPolicy.contactUsDescription: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, or if you are the owner of any content used on our website and wish to discuss its use, please contact us at:
